OldMap::OldMap (  uint32  mapID,
const char *  path
) 
 

Create a new OldMap.

The map is { not} filled with data from the file. This must be done by calling the load()-method after creation.

Parameters:
mapID Id of the map to be loaded.
path The file-path to the map.
